bill.title: Relating To Security Interests In Real Property.
bill.description: Clarifies public records by amending the procedure for clearing titles by adding a reference to recorded assignments of leases and rents for which the underlying debt has been fully paid or satisfied. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to CPH, JDL.
The committee(s) on CPH has scheduled a public hearing on 01-31-17 9:00AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Nishihara, S. Chang, Espero; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara, Kidani, Ruderman.
Reported from CPH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 38) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 02-27-17 10:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, K. Rhoads, Gabbard, Kim, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 840) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-07-17.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 149) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to IAC/CPC, FIN, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by IAC/CPC on Tuesday, 03-21-17 2:00PM in House conference room 329.

The committees on IAC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Ohno, Choy, Ito, Tokioka, Woodson, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cachola, Onishi.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Takumi, Ito, Takayama, Todd, Yamane, Fukumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Aquino, Say.
Reported from IAC/CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1298) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Aquino, DeCoite, Har, Ichiyama, C. Lee, Thielen excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 03-31-17 3:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Cachola, Choy, DeCoite, Gates, Holt, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, LoPresti, Lowen, Nakamura, Tokioka, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Quinlan, Tupola.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1678), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Oshiro, Saiki, Say excused (3). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 460).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 540).
House Conferees Appointed: Ohno, Takumi, Choy Co-Chairs; Ward.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 587).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Baker Chair; Keith-Agaran Co-Chair; S. Chang.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 681).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-21-17 2:30PM in conference room 016.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-24-17 2:30PM in conference room 016.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-17 2:30PM in conference room 016.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Keith-Agaran, S. Chang; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Ohno, Takumi, Choy, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 69).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-02-17.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 69) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-02-17.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 737).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 642).
Enrolled to Governor.
